text: Dressed to Kill is a 1980 American thriller movie directed by Brian De Palma and starring Michael Caine, Angie Dickinson, Nancy Allen, Keith Gordon, Dennis Franz, David Margulies. It was distributed by Filmways Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 thriller movies Category:1980 LGBT movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Brian De Palma
title: Dressed to Kill (1980 movie)
